MemberSignature.Value: member this.AuthorizationToken : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets authorization token used to communicate with the service.
Docs.remarks: Note: The caller needs to ensure that the authorization token is valid. Before the authorization token expires, the caller needs to refresh it by calling this setter with a new valid token. Otherwise, the recognizer will encounter errors during recognition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.Translation.TranslationRecognitionResult> RecognizeOnceAsync() cil managed
Public Function RecognizeOnceAsync () As Task(Of TranslationRecognitionResult)

Docs.summary: Starts speech translation as an asynchronous operation.
Docs.returns: A task representing the recognition operation. The task returns a value of
Docs.remarks:
The end of a single utterance is determined by listening for silence at the end, or until a timeout period has elapsed. The task returns the translated version of the recognized speech in **TranslationRecognitionResult.Text**.
You can call **StopContinuousRecognitionAsync** to stop recognition before a phrase has been recognized for translation.
Since this method returns only a single utterance, it is suitable only for single shot recognition like command or query. For long-running multi-utterance recognition, use **StartContinuousRecognitionAsync** instead.
See also: [Get started with speech translation](/azure/cognitive-services/speech-service/get-started-speech-translation)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Recognizing As EventHandler(Of TranslationRecognitionEventArgs)

Docs.summary: The event signals that an intermediate recognition result is received.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SpeechRecognitionLanguage As String

Docs.summary: Gets the language name that was set when the recognizer was created.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task StartContinuousRecognitionAsync() cil managed

Docs.summary: Starts recognition and translation on a continous audio stream, until StopContinuousRecognitionAsync() is called. You must subscribe to events to receive translation results.
Docs.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that starts the recognition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task StartKeywordRecognitionAsync(class Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.KeywordRecognitionModel model) cil managed
Public Function StartKeywordRecognitionAsync (model As KeywordRecognitionModel) As Task

Docs.param: The keyword recognition model that specifies the keyword to be recognized.
Docs.summary: Configures the recognizer with the given keyword model. After calling this method, the recognizer is listening for the keyword to start the recognition. Call StopKeywordRecognitionAsync() to end the keyword initiated recognition. You must subscribe to events to receive recognition results.
Docs.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that starts the recognition.
Docs.remarks: See also: [Use a keyword model with the SDK](/azure/cognitive-services/speech-service/custom-keyword-basics?pivots=programming-language-csharp#use-a-keyword-model-with-the-sdk)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task StopContinuousRecognitionAsync() cil managed

Docs.summary: Stops a running recognition operation as soon as possible and immediately requests a result based on the the input that has been processed so far. This works for all recognition operations, not just continuous ones, and facilitates the use of push-to-talk or "finish now" buttons for manual audio endpointing.
Docs.returns: A task that will complete when input processing has been stopped. Result generation, if applicable for the input provided, may happen after this task completes and should be handled with the appropriate event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task StopKeywordRecognitionAsync() cil managed

Docs.summary: Ends the keyword initiated recognition.
Docs.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation that stops the recognition.
Docs.remarks: Note: Keyword recognition features might work with any microphone type, but offical support is currently limited to the microphone arrays found in the Azure Kinect DK hardware or the Speech Devices SDK.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Synthesizing As EventHandler(Of TranslationSynthesisEventArgs)

Docs.summary: The event signals that a translation synthesis result is received.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TargetLanguages As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String)

Docs.summary: Gets target languages for translation that were set when the recognizer was created. Each language is specified in BCP-47 format. The translation will provide translated text for each of language.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VoiceName As String

Docs.summary: Gets the name of output voice if speech synthesis is used.
